name: Wisdom (itch)
description:
HEAJ GameJam 2019 - Beard - 8h

Wisdom is an idle game in which you grow your beard in order to become the wisest man on earth.
Cut your beard to share your wisdom with the world and get followers that will help your grow your beard even longer.

Controls :
Mouse Click : Grow beardSlide : Cut beard

Made by Constantin Liétard , Thomas Denis.
